activities: Maintain organization’s client and customer information.
recoursemech: We shall investigate and attempt to resolve any complaints and disputes regarding its use and disclosure of Personal Information in accordance with the Principles. If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through an internal process, the Company shall agree to dispute resolution using a qualified third-party resolution provider (the International Centre for Dispute Resolution, a division of the American Arbitration Association (AAA)) or, if applicable to human resources data, participate in dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities (DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
